actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to authorize the coinage of 50-cent pieces to commemorate the life of Hon. Sam Rayburn and to assist in the support of the Sam Rayburn Library.

summary.text: Provides for the coinage of 50-cent pieces to commemorate the life of the Honorable Sam Rayburn with the proceeds to assist in the support of the Sam Rayburn Library.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the coinage of 50-cent pieces to commemorate the life of Hon. Sam Rayburn and to assist in the support of the Sam Rayburn Library.
